        eGeomImage_EpipolairePure  
        eGeomImageOri  
   </#IF>


   
    	   ${Im1} 
    	   ${Im2}    
   

   <#WHEN VTEST=${DoEpi}>

                  $1_Masq.tif

ParamMICMAC.Section_WorkSpace:
<#WHEN VTEST=${NotEpi}> Chantier-Ori </#WHEN>
ThisDir ${DirMEC}/ ${DirMEC}/ ${DirPyram}
${Purge}
${NbProc}
<#WHEN VTEST=${DoPly}>
${MMDir}bin/Nuage2Ply ${ThisDir}${DirMEC}/NuageImProf_Chantier-Ori_Etape_Last.xml Scale=${ScalePly} Attr=${Im1} Out=${ThisDir}${DirMEC}/PLY${Im1}-${Im2}.ply RatioAttrCarte=${ZoomF}
</#WHEN>
1024 128 <#WHEN VTEST=${NotUseGpu}> 1000 </#WHEN> <#WHEN VTEST=${UseGpu}> 512 </#WHEN> 20 40 eComprTiff_None
